name: dmcoss2

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccoss(c0)), crn(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(ccoss(c0)), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(, ~(c0))= ran(c0)
⊣ dom(, ~(c0))= dom(`' c0)
⊣ ran(c0)= dom(`' c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccoss(c0)), crn(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(ccoss(c0)), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ dom(, ~(c0))= ran(c0)
⊣ dom(, ~(c0))= dom(`' c0)
⊣ ran(c0)= dom(`' c0)

comment: The domain of cosets is the range. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-Dec-2018.)
